com.octo.android.robospice.spicelist

Class SpiceArrayAdapter<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • android.widget.ArrayAdapter<T>
        • com.octo.android.robospice.spicelist.SpiceArrayAdapter<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of data displayed by the list.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.Filterable, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter

    public abstract class SpiceArrayAdapter<T>
extends android.widget.ArrayAdapter<T>
    An adapter that is optimized for SpiceListView instances. It offers to update ImageViews contained in SpiceListItemView instances with images loaded from the network. All you have to do is to Override createRequest(Object) to define a request for each object in the list that is associated an image to display. Also please note that in your ArrayAdapter.getView(int, android.view.View, android.view.ViewGroup) method, you must call updateListItemViewAsynchronously(Object, SpiceListItemView) in order for your SpiceListItemView to be updated automagically.
    Author:
    sni

    • Method Detail

      • setDefaultUserDrawable

        public void setDefaultUserDrawable(android.graphics.drawable.Drawable defaultUserDrawable)

      • updateListItemViewAsynchronously

        protected void updateListItemViewAsynchronously(T data,
                                    SpiceListItemView<T> view)
        Updates a SpiceListItemView containing some data. The method createRequest(Object) will be applied to data to know which request to execute to get data from network if needed. This method must be called during ArrayAdapter.getView(int, android.view.View, android.view.ViewGroup).
        Parameters:
        data - the data to update the SpiceListItemView with.
        view - the SpiceListItemView that displays an image to represent data.

      • createRequest

        public abstract BigBinaryRequest createRequest(T data)
        Returns the SpiceRequest used to update the image associated to a given data.
        Parameters:
        data - the data whose image will be fetched from network by this query.
        Returns:
        the SpiceRequest used to update the image associated to a given data.

        protected void loadBitmapAsynchronously(T octo,

      • convertDpToPixel

        public static float convertDpToPixel(float dp,
                     android.content.Context context)
        This method convets dp unit to equivalent device specific value in pixels.
        Parameters:
        dp - A value in dp(Device independent pixels) unit. Which we need to convert into pixels
        context - Context to get resources and device specific display metrics
        Returns:
        A float value to represent Pixels equivalent to dp according to device
        See Also:
        ://stackoverflow.com/questions/4605527/converting-pixels-to-dp-in- android
